project.projectDescription:
"Getting the most of your source code"
Introduction
Software development is by its nature a series of translations and compromises. What the end user wants, what the customer is willing to pay for, and what is technically feasible rarely combine to form a unified set of features.
Source Agile software explore how an Agile team can work to understand each other better, in particular at the communication divide between stakeholders and developers. It will show you how to develop a domain-specific ubiquitous language, how to lessen the responsibility gap between managers and developers, and how to use your codebase as the central source for documentation.
Motivation
Does your source code lack knowledge? Is it a complex mess that just doesn't make any sense to anyone, even possibly you? If you or one of your employees left work now, would others be able to make sense of it?
Source Agile is a tool for your software project, shedding light on the darkness of codebase by extracting a smart, easy to read summary of the content. Just write your code well and let Source Agile take care of the rest.

entry.featureDescription: Show the first page of the system.
Animated image to demonstrate that the system is processing the user request.
Show the Javadoc of the class dynamic generated.
Show the source code of the class with the syntax highlighted.
List all the features assigned for the current project.
Show the documentation of the class in a specification format.

method.methodDescription: Show the name of the class with its package name and description.

entry.featureDescription: Edit the documentation of the class in a web form.
List all the features assigned for the current project.
Show all the classes of the current project as a specification format.
List all the classes tagged in the current project.
Show a Columns Chart with the total amount of tasks, classes and methods in the current project.
Show the list of planning tasks.
The user can insert a new task in the source code typing the name and description of the task in a web based form page.
List all the classes assigned as "To Do" in the current project.
Delete the selected task from the project backlog.
Change the task name or description created for the project backlog.
List all the planning tasks created for the current project.
Open a connection with the repository that was entered in the project data.
Add a new planning task in the project database.
Delete the planning task from the database.
Edit the planning task in the project database.
List all the projects added in the system.
List all the projects added in the system.

method.methodDescription: List all the constructor methods of a class.
List all the methods of a class.
Convert the parameter list in a String.

entry.featureDescription: Protected constructors prevent the world from exploding!
TODO: Use the enum Tokens from JDK source code.

An interface that defines codes for Java source tokens returned from lexical analysis.

This is NOT part of any API suppored by Sun Microsystems. If you write code that depends on this, you do so at your own risk. This code and its internal interfaces are subject to change or deletion without notice.

method.methodDescription: Return the last name of a names sequence separated by dots already separated by spaces between the upper case letters.
Return the last name of a names sequence separated by dots.
Return the name of the file without its extension after the "."
Fill with spaces a name that is truncated.
